dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No no no no no no no...Jacob... He looks up at her, slowly dying.  She strokes his forehe while Freddy laughs at the sentiment.  FREDDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Young love...ha! JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Karen...dream...powers.... And Jacob is gone.  Karen sobs, so torn apart that she is ignoring the incredible danger above her.  But not for lo Krueger grabs Karen by the neck. FREDDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's past your bedtime, young lady. And he starts to DRAG her, kicking and screaming, her bod scraping across the floor towards the

dialogues.speaker: MASTER BEDROOM
dialogues.text: Freddy drags Karen in and TOSSES her across the room.  Sh lands with a THUD on the bed.  He saunters over to her an climbs up on the bed next to her.  Gets on top. Karen yells and hits him uselessly with her fists and it' horrible because there he is, pressing down on her, right her face, mounting her as if he's going to rape her. FREDDY (cont'd)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aw, sweetheart.  This won't hurt a bit. She screams as he presses even harder. FREDDY (cont'd)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on.  Be Daddy's little girl. And the last three words of that sentence seem to ECHO  through the room, swirling around Karen.  DADDY'S LITTLE  GIRL.  "Daddy's little girl."  Karen twists her head away And Freddy's become Karen's FATHER.  He looks down on her with a lecherous grin. KAREN'S FATHER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's my baby.  That's Daddy's little  girl. Karen stops struggling.  The realization grows on her fac with the resurfacing memory. KAREN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh no... KAREN'S FATHER (Freddy's voice)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now do you remember? She does.  And she has an answer for him. KAREN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're NOT my father. KAREN'S FATHER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But we're going to have the same fun! Karen stares at him defiantly.  And a HAND grabs Karen's  Father, and yanks him away.  We PULL BACK.   KAREN'S MOTHER is next to the bed.  Furious. KAREN'S MOTHER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's enough! And she SLAPS Karen's Father.  He stands up, SLUGS her ac the jaw.  She tumbles back.  Karen sits up. KAREN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mommy, no! Karen's Mother gets up, a defiant look just like Karen's her face. KAREN'S MOTHER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're never going to touch her again! KAREN'S FATHER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll touch what I want! BAP!  He strikes her again, sending her right out the doo He follows her. Karen stands up and runs after them.

dialogues.speaker: IN THE HALLWAY
dialogues.text: CRACK!  The man hits the woman down to the floor.  Karen' mother stands up, just taking it.  She's at the top of th stairs.  Karen's Father swings his arm back, and Karen ju on him.  He shrugs her away violently.

dialogues.speaker: WITH KAREN
dialogues.text: as she hits the ground and the wall next to Jacob's body. She looks up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And Karen's Father is now FREDDY again.  He swings his fi

dialogues.speaker: SMACK
dialogues.text: Karen's Mother reels from the hit, falls backwards.  Kare jumps up to try and help her, reaching past Freddy.  But too late. Karen's Mother tumbles down the stairs, head hitting, bon cracking, disappearing into darkness. Freddy grabs Karen by the neck and lifts her.  DANGLES he over the top of the steps. FREDDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Be honored, bitch.  You're the last soul  I need. And Jacob RISES UP behind Krueger.  GRABS him.  Freddy DR Karen.  She hits hard and rolls down the steps as Freddy  turns, his knives swinging out and SLAMMING Jacob's gut o more time, IMPALING him against the wall.  Jacob gasps ou his final breath. JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll be back... FREDDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll be waiting. Freddy pulls his blades out of Jacob and the wall.  The b body hits the floor for the last time.  Freddy turns back the stairs and looks down them. FREDDY (cont'd)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's my little pumpkin? He strolls down the steps.

dialogues.speaker: DOWNSTAIRS HALLWAY
dialogues.text: Freddy walks down and no one's there.  Karen's Mom was ju an illusion, but Karen herself, dead or alive, is nowhere be seen. FREDDY (cont'd)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Play time is over, bitch. He walks down the hallway.  Eyes darting.  Until a BOOMIN VOICE is heard from the kitchen. VOICE

dialogues.speaker: FREDERICK
dialogues.text: Freddy cocks his head and frowns. VOICE (cont'd)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frederick!  What have you done? And, amazingly, a look of FEAR crosses Krueger's face.   Something about that voice has struck terror in the heart the creature that fears nobody. Krueger turns to the kitchen door.  A man steps out of th shadows, a big muscular man with a horrifying look in his eyes.  A man we've seen somewhere before - in a picture. It's FREDDY'S FOSTER FATHER - MR. UNDERWOOD.  And he look pissed beyond belief. Freddy shrinks back, eyes widening. FREDDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daddy? MR. UNDERWOOD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't you "Daddy" me! Mr. Underwood raises his arm and SMACKS Freddy across the skull.  Krueger tumbles back into the hallway. Freddy scrambles to his feet.  Shakes with dread.  Looks a scared little boy.  Mr. Underwood advances on him. FREDDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, Daddy. Please... Freddy turns and bolts for the front door.  He flings it  open.  Power Cop stands in his way and SHOVES Freddy back back in front of his foster father. PUNCH - a vicious blow from Underwood sends Krueger into

dialogues.speaker: THE LIVING ROOM
dialogues.text: where Freddy falls over a couch.  Underwood stomps into t room. Krueger scrambles up and heads for the archway lead into the dining room. BLADE COP blocks the escape.  The ripped flap of her unif proving she's the real one. She KICKS Freddy back and int Underwood's hands.  The man picks up Krueger and HITS him again.  And again.  And again. FREDDY (cont'd)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop.  You're hurting me.  Stop. Freddy wriggles away and opens a window.  Sound Cop fills window, cutting him off.  Pushes him back inside. Mr. Underwood grabs Krueger and slaps him over and over. Slugs him.  Gives the beating he's got coming to him. And Freddy MOANS and YELLS like a blubbering child.  Shri into a corner but is yanked out for more pummeling. Power Cop stands at the exit to the hallway.  Blade Cop  continues to obstruct the dining room arch.  Sound Cop st through the window and stands in front of it.  The Dream  Police just stare in silence. It's not a street fight, not a punching match.  Just a  ruthless thrashing that would be hard to watch if it were for the fact that we are all cheering because no one in  history has ever deserved it more. Underwood stops the whipping and stands over Krueger who lying on the ground whimpering, pleading for mercy. FREDDY (cont'd)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why, Daddy?  What did I do? MR. UNDERWOOD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You took some things that don't belong to  you! And with that, Underwood brings his fist down and JAMS it into Freddy's stomach.  Right THROUGH IT.  Shoving it int his very body. Freddy SCREAMS.  Underwood violently pulls his fist out a there's SOMETHING in it.  A shimmering flowing thing.   Crackling with unworldly LIGHT.  It's a SOUL.  It's Wesle SOUL.  Underwood flings his arm out and lets go.  Wesley' soul flies into thin air and DISSIPATES. Krueger's father brings his hand down again and RIPS out  GINA'S SOUL.  Again.  JACOB'S SOUL.  Freddy opens his mou and shrieks.  As Underwood raises his arms and begins to  SPARKLE.  FLASHES of light bounce around his body. He's  changing. And something's happening to Freddy's too.  Steam is risi from the creature.  His feet are starting to flatten as h lays on the ground and BLACK GOO oozes from his pores. He's melting.  And still screaming as he watches his fost father's image turn into: KAREN.  An aura of LIGHT vanishes around her body as she  lowers her arms with a victorious yet sad look on her fac Freddy DIES. A look of horrified realization burns in Krueger's eyes a sees Karen and CONTINUES to scream inhumanly. His body dissolves, all of it liquefying into BLACK SLIME Gone.  Just a bubbling black puddle of gunk is left.  His SHRIEK echoes through the room and everywhere else. Then the GUNK grows and changes into a dark cloud that be to EXPAND. Power Cop runs up, grabs Karen and yells. POWER COP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We gotta get outta here! Karen, almost mesmerized by the black cloud spreading in  front of her, stumbles away with Power Cop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Dream Police and Karen bolt out the front door and ru down the street as a RUMBLE joins Freddy's thunderous SHR and the entire town begins to SHAKE. We stay with a shot of the house as the noise and vibrati continue. And the Elm Street House EXPLODES.  The BLACK CLOUD punch out the roof and the walls, sending wood and debris flyin everywhere. The rubble flies into the air, hangs there for a beat, th falls to the ground. All is SILENT.  And the dark cloud turns WHITE.  The milk fog spreads out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Karen falls to her knees on the pavement, not looking bac the destruction one block away. The Dream Police stop running to turn to face her.  Karen hangs her head and cries. Blade steps forward. BLADE COP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It took a human touch.  It took knowing  HIS nightmare.  Goodbye, Karen. Karen raises her head as the Dream Police turn away.

dialogues.speaker: THE DREAM POLICE
dialogues.text: walk off into the distance.  Just as they are about to va into the darkness, a FOURTH FIGURE appears and joins them formation.  Then they all disappear.

dialogues.speaker: KAREN
dialogues.text: Her mouth drops open at what she's just seen.  What she  DOESN'T see is the white cloud swooping down the street  behind her. She just closes her eyes as the ivory mist  envelops her and the SCREEN GOES WHITE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Karen lies sleeping on the bench amongst the grass and tr Her eyes open and squint at the bright light.  She sits u and tries to get her bearings.  Some hair falls into her and she brushes it away.  Only then noticing that she's  holding something in her hand. She opens her hand and looks down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's an ID bracelet.  A band of gold with a larger plate  dangling from the middle of it.  Karen's hand turns it ov This time the printing reads JACOB.

dialogues.speaker: WITH KAREN
dialogues.text: she chokes back the tears.  We hear a PANTING O.S.  Then woman's voice. WOMAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You okay, honey? Karen looks up as we PULL BACK.  A pleasant-looking woman longer a mutant, is walking her cute dog.  She looks  sincerely concerned.  Karen nods. KAREN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.  I'm alright. WOMAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've never seen you around.  Are you new  in town? KAREN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sort of. WOMAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well then... (she smiles)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Welcome to Springwood. The woman continues on her way.  Karen sighs and puts the bracelet on her wrist.  She stands and our SHOT PULLS UP AWAY as the pretty young girl starts walking through a to she's never seen - except in her dreams.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
